import React ,{useState , useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import Header from '../../Header'; const EducationScreen = ({history}) =>{ const [user, setUser]= useState(Object); useEffect(() => { if(!localStorage.getItem("authToken")){ history.push("/login") } const config = { headers: { "Content-Type":"appliation/json", Authorization: `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("authToken")}` } } console.log(config.headers.Authorization) try { axios.get("/api/auth/details_user",config).then((response)=>{ setUser(response.data.data); console.log(user)}); } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } ,[history]); return ( <>
